## ğŸš€ How to Update

### Web Application

1. Pull the latest changes
2. Install dependencies: `npm install`
3. Run: `npm run dev` (development) or `npm run build` (production)

### Desktop Client

1. Download the latest Windows MSI installer from [releases page](https://github.com/Teyk0o/simsforge/releases)
2. Run the installer
3. Follow the installation wizard
